subject: Enquiry about shipping to India
description_text:
Hi,

I want to purchase the simsonn plus x pedals, could you please let me know
the details on delivery, tax and customs, where is the product shipping
from and whether I have to deal with customs my self if shipped from
outside India, and where will be taxed.

Thanks
Manideep

conversations.body_text: Hi Manideep Sridhara,  We will ship from China; you only need to cooperate with the logistics company to complete customs clearance.
